articles.author: Jennifer Hiller, Sean McLain, Ryan Felton
articles.title: Tesla Is Pulling Back From EV Charging, and People Are Freaking Out - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Widespread layoffs within the Tesla unit are a blow to efforts to build out a national charging network

articles.title: Apple working to fix alarming iPhone issue - BBC.com
articles.description: Users have been reporting unexpected lie-ins after the alarms on their phones failed to go off.

articles.author: Ingrid Lunden
articles.title: LinkedIn launches gaming: three logic puzzles aiming to extend time spent on its networking platform - TechCrunch
articles.description: In an effort to attract more users and increase engagement, LinkedIn is launching three games: Queens, Crossclimb and Pinpoint.
articles.content: Back in March, TechCrunch broke the news that LinkedIn was quietly testing the waters for games on its platform word and logic puzzles similar to Wordle. Now, in an effort to attract more users and iâ€¦ [+5029 chars]
